nodes.text: Kirgatz was a game played with a board and forty-six wooden tiles. Two possible hands in the game were a Crimson Rush and a Damakian Tide. While on Chandrila, Lando Calrissian played a game of kirgatz with Barpa, Sev Cataban, and Admiral Zo Ryda. The hand known as a Crimson Rush was known to be lower than a Damakian Tide in the game.
